nodes.text: The Raithal Academy was an Imperial service academy on the planet Raithal. It was part of the Imperial Academy, a network of academies that supplied troops and personnel to the Imperial Military. It accepted talented Imperial cadets who had reached the age of eighteen years. It was regarded as more prestigious than the Corulag Military Academy. It was Anya Razar's ambition to attend this academy.
Filia Rossi, who replaced Rik Virgilio as captain of the Gozanti-class cruiser Blood Crow, had graduated from the Raithal Academy.
